course_title: Special Topics in Contemporary Journalism - INTERVIEWING

001.comments: This is a module course worth 1.5 credits. Students must have successfully completed JRNL 503 and JRNL 515. The class will run with a min. enrollment of 12 students. If the class becomes full, please email jrnl.journal@ubc.ca to be put on the wait list.  The class will be conducrted online. Please await further instructions from the course instructor near the start of term. If the course becomes full, please email jrnl.journal@ubc.ca to be added to the Waitlist.
